description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
All Changes

Enhancements

EMAILNET-38453 - EWS: Retrieve Extended Properties for Items
EMAILNET-34620 - Exclude the public MhtFormatter class
EMAILNET-38573 - EML to MHTML: Provision to determine output From and To fields automatically
EMAILNET-38605 - In MapiContact BirthDay, Anniversary etc. should be independent of local time zone
EMAILNET-38596 - Add MapiRecipient with empty email address
EMAILNET-38609 - MBox to PST Conversion: Option to show progress

Bugs

EMAILNET-38580 - Email address cannot be validated
EMAILNET-38594 - MailMessage.MessageId returns empty string for emails from Sent Items folder
EMAILNET-38595 - MapiMessage.IsMsgFormat detects Office documents as MSG
EMAILNET-38603 - EML to HTML contains garbage characters in output
EMAILNET-38607 - Attachments not detected from EML file
EMAILNET-38608 - Encoding issue in message body while loading MailMessage having System.Text.SBCSCodePageEncoding
EMAILNET-38612 - TNEF Attachments appear as a single winmail.dat file when sent using IEWSClient.Send
EMAILNET-38620 - Drag Drop not able to read file names for messages dragged from Outlook
EMAILNET-38625 - Attachments not loaded in MSG file
EMAILNET-38611 - HTML body cropped when loading MailMessage from HTML file
EMAILNET-38545 - Recurring Calendar events: Modified occurences are not shown properly by ICS added to PST
EMAILNET-38569 - Performance issue while adding MapiMessage to PST
EMAILNET-38586 - IEWSClient.ListMessages raise InvalidOpertationException for Office 365 PersonMetadata folder
EMAILNET-38598 - OutOfMemoryException in SmtpClient when using SecurityOptions.SSLExplicit
EMAILNET-38601 - Saving EML as MSG raises Exception
EMAILNET-38602 - IGmailClient.CreateContact raises Aspose.Email.GoogleClientException
EMAILNET-38621 - ArgumentOutOfRangeException is raised when fetching message using IEWSClient
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
